Hmmm... what else, what else? The fridge contains a fried pork chop, a fried white tuna, a white onion and a raw red tuna. Huh, weird. You can see a closed oven close by. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a counter. You see a raw red potato on the counter. You see a stove. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The stove is conventional. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Kitchen =-0/5
